# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(MFIXCDF_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(MFIXCDF)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
MFIXCDFPluginInfo.C
MFIXCDFCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
MFIXCDFPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
MFIXCDFMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtMFIXCDFFileFormat.C
avtMFIXCDFOptions.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
MFIXCDFEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtMFIXCDFFileFormat.C
avtMFIXCDFOptions.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${NETCDF_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

if(WIN32)
    add_compile_definitions(${NETCDF_WIN32_DEFINES})
endif()

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${NETCDF_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IMFIXCDFDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IMFIXCDFDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IMFIXCDFDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MMFIXCDFDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MMFIXCDFDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser ${NETCDF_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MMFIXCDFDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MMFIXCDFDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EMFIXCDFDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EMFIXCDFDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser ${NETCDF_LIB} )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EMFIXCDFDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EMFIXCDFDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EMFIXCDFDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EMFIXCDFDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par ${NETCDF_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EMFIXCDFDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EMFIXCDFDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases MFIXCDF ${INSTALLTARGETS})
